Vidya bats for temple entry

Bollywood actor Vidya Balan on Wednesday said the age-old practice of ban on entry of women of menstrual age in some temples was unfair.

“It is great that we ask these questions now. Men and women should get equal opportunity at work, social life and everywhere,” the actor said.

“We are saying how unfair it is... I think we will see the changes in our lifetime,” Ms. Balan told reporters. — PTI
title: Ban on women’s entry in some temples unfair: Vidya Balan
